column3: {{c1::What's on at the cinema this week?}}
column4: What's on at cinema this week? / What's on at the cinema this week?

column3: {{c1::Sarah spends most of her time watching TV.}}
column4: Sarah spends most of her time watching TV. / Sarah spends most of her time watching the TV.

column3: {{c1::Do you ever listen to the radio?}}
column4: Do you ever listen to radio? / Do you ever listen to the radio?

column3: {{c1::The television was on, but nobody was watching it.}}
column4: Television was on, but nobody was watching it. / The television was on, but nobody was watching it.

column3: {{c1::When was the last time you went to the theatre?}}
column4: When was the last time you went to theatre? / When was the last time you went to the theatre?
